original_text: But Lord, your people who have died will live again. Their bodies will rise up from their graves. You people who live in the ground, wake up! Shout because you are happy. You bring new life to the earth, like dew that comes in the morning. Dead people will come up from the earth and they will live again.
korean_text: 주의 죽은 자들은 살아나고 그들의 시체들은 일어나리이다 티끌에 누운 자들아 너희는 깨어 노래하라 주의 이슬은 빛난 이슬이니 땅이 죽은 자들을 내놓으리로다

sentences.original_text: But Lord, your people who have died will live again.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 주여, 죽은 당신의 백성은 다시 살 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: Their bodies will rise up from their graves.
You people who live in the ground, wake up!
You bring new life to the earth,
like dew that comes in the morning.
Dead people will come up from the earth
